reviews.review: Needs improvement on anti cheat but all in all Good. Hackers made this game dead
Si antes pagando por tenerlo habia chetos ahora gratis al por mayor, que pena porque es el unico de su especie.

[h1]Great FPS game[/h1]

This game is both competitive and fun.
A lot of great maps, well-balanced weapons and cool items.

This game has always had a lot of cheaters and toxic people, which is disappointing - however, Valve has stepped up a lot and I have personally not played againt/with any cheaters in a long time.

In-game drops is also awesome - if you don't want to spend any money on in-game items, you can receive drops after getting a certain amount of XP or levels.[i](i.ex. weapon skins & grafitti)[/i]
